brief.content-text:
The diagram depicts a source node and a destination node, each with an O S I model next to it. The PDU at each layer is shown as data moves from the source node to the destination node.

O S I Layers 7, 6, and 5 - PDU is data.
O S I Layer 4 - PDU is a segment.
O S I Layer 3 - PDU is a packet.
O S I Layer 2 - PDU is a frame.
O S I Layer 1 - PDU is bits.

Signals on the physical media are depicted by a line that moves up and down, representing zeros and ones or bits of data.
